name: ApplyticsFramework
summary: Appylytics IOS SDK which is used for tracking your application event etc.
description:
ApplyticsFramework introduced by Applytics for tracking your application installation and other custom events. ApplyticsFramework is the world's leading mobile attribution & marketing analytics platform, helping app marketers around the world make better decisions.
Applytics IOS SDK which is used for tracking your application event etc.
